header.description: This is meant to simulate Optfine's 'Fancy Grass' somewhat, by making the sides of grass blocks all grass! Add this addon above the main pack! (order does not matter)
header.name: Kelly's §oFancy §r§aGrass §fAddon

subpacks.name: (§l§oGrass Side W/Trim§r)This setting makes it so that the grass is trimmed at the bottom, leaving a little bit of exposed dirt.
(§l§oGrass Side Fully Covered§r)This setting makes it so the entire side of the grass block is nothing but grass!
